title: Tank uodate question for rioters
body:
May we see our big submersible friend {{champion:111}} nautilus? 

Even if there are no major changes, I really liked the sonar pings from his music in "a new dawn" cinematic, I was wondering if that audio could make it into his kit? Make him sound a bit more like someone who is still trapped underwater, even when trudging along on land.

I'm not sure if nautilus is a warden or vanguard as he has good engage and OK peel.

(I guess this was more of a thematic question... sorry.)

Forward... Forward...
